Name: Serendipity (by Colin Field)
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Spirity, minty apple invigorated by a splash of champagne.
History: Our adaptation of Colin Field 's signature drink. Collin first served this drink on 31 December 1994 at Bar Hemingway Bar in the Paris Ritz Hotel for Jean-Louis Constanza. Upon tasting it, Jean-Louis exclaimed, "Serendipity!"
